title: Caption Jump (full brown layer shift) Duffy Sov460
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Caption Jump (full brown layer shift) Duffy Sov460
posts.post_content:
$1650 shipped and insured via no-fee payment method.

One-of-a-kind print oddity and it's a HOFer and tougher back.  Doesn't get much better than that!

The card itself is pretty nice.  It should have graded a 2 or so, but SGC insisted on giving it an A because of the print oddity.

Back when I used to drink, all my T206 cards looked like that...

:eek:

Beautiful card, Luke.

Haha, nice Eric!

I'm open to offers on this one.  Tough to price since there is nothing else quite like it.
